========================
Adaptive Integrator
========================
.. currentmodule:: src.core.adaptive_integrator

Overview
--------
Adaptive Runge–Kutta integrators for state‑space models.

Examples
--------
.. doctest::

   >>> from src.core.adaptive_integrator import *
